pkgmetadata.longdescription: Classical Cryptography Methods for Words and Phrases // Classical cryptography methods for words and brief phrases. Substitution, transposition and concealment (null) ciphers are available, like Caesar, Vigenre, Atbash, affine, simple substitution, Playfair, rail fence, Scytale, single column, bifid, trifid, and Polybius ciphers.
